items.content:
Introduction:

English version

A travel bureau, Civitatis Tours, has been hacked and unfortunately all their citytrips have been wiped away. They have asked you to help them create a new city trip.

You will plan a city trip of 5 days in your assigned group. You can choose from three different cities in each of the five countries. You give us insight in what you would like to see from the culture, what kind of food you want to eat during your trip, what kind of weather they have there and a bit about the history of the city. You will write down everything you plan on doing during this trip in your project plan and you will present this eventually in the form of a flyer, presentation, collage or a video.

The assignment:

What would you like to see during your citytrip?

Choose at least:

  • Two musea that you would like to see.
  • Look into what the locals eat in your chosen city and where you would like to eat every evening.
  • Two tourist attraction that you would like to see. (For example: famous buildings, statues or a park a football stadium)
  • How you will travel in the city during the citytrip. (For example: by car, by underground or by bus)
  • And what the weather will be like during your visit.

You will present your final product during the travel market in Lesson 3, where you will explain why you have chosen these activities for your final product and will try to convince us why we should also go on this journey.

If there are any questions during the making of this project, first see if you can solve this within the group and if that does not work out you can ask the teacher for help!

Nederlandse versie

Een reisbureau, Civitatis Tours, is gehackt en helaas zijn al hun citytrips zijn verdwenen. Ze hebben jullie gevraagd om hen te helpen bij het maken van een nieuwe citytrip.

Je plant in je toegewezen groepje een citytrip van 5 dagen. Jullie kunnen bij elk van de vijf landen kiezen uit drie verschillende steden. Je geeft ons inzicht in wat je zou willen zien van de cultuur, wat voor soort eten je tijdens je reis wilt eten, wat voor weer ze daar hebben en een beetje over de geschiedenis van de stad. Je schrijft alles op wat je van plan bent te doen tijdens deze reis in jullie project plan en jullie presenteren het in de vorm van een map, presentatie, collage of een video.

De opdracht:

Wat willen jullie graag zien tijdens jullie citytrip?

Kies op zijn minst:

  • Twee musea die jullie willen zien.
  • Zoek op wat de bewoners eten en waar jullie graag willen eten elke avond.
  • Twee bezienswaardigheden die jullie willen zien. (gebouwen, standbeelden of voetbalstadions)
  • Hoe jullie gaan rondreizen in de stad. (bijvoorbeeld: met de auto of tram of bus)
  • En wat het weer zal zijn tijdens jullie bezoek.

Je zal je eindproduct presenteren tijdens de travelmarkt in les 3, waarin je uitlegt waarom je deze activiteiten voor je eindproduct hebt gekozen en ons zult proberen te overtuigen waarom we ook op deze reis moeten gaan.

Als er vragen zijn tijdens het maken van dit project kijk je eerst of je dit binnen de groep kunt oplossen en als dat niet lukt kun je de leraar om hulp vragen!

The steps

Step 1

Begin met het kiezen van een van de volgende steden:

  • New York in America
  • London in England
  • Glasgow in Scotland
  • Dublin in Ireland
  • Toronto in Canada

Step 2

Lees het onderstaande artikel over jullie gekozen stad. Hierdoor krijgen jullie een beetje een idee van wat er allemaal gedaan kan worden in deze stad. Jullie kunnen deze informatie eventueel gebruiken om keuzes te maken over welke toeristenatracties jullie willen bezoeken tijdens de citytrip, welke musea jullie willen bezoeken, wat jullie willen eten, hoe jullie gaan rondreizen in de stad en wat het weer zal zijn.


New York: https://www.nycgo.com/articles/new-york-city-in-three-days

London: https://www.travelandleisure.com/articles/video-five-things-to-do-in-london

Glasgow: https://trip101.com/article/best-day-trips-from-glasgow

Dublin: https://www.travelandleisure.com/travel-guide/dublin-and-the-east/things-to-do

Toronto: https://www.lonelyplanet.com/canada/toronto

Step 3

Luister naar de video van jullie gekozen stad.

Some information about the cities:

New York: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUuHyXguUsg

London: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45ETZ1xvHS0

Glasgow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7ZqiSKIB9g

Dublin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LcKnx7I97yk

Toronto: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7uY0Ab5HlZ0

Step 4

Maak een woordweb met woorden die te maken hebben met de stad die jullie hebben gekozen. Zet de naam van de stad in het midden van het papier en probeer 2 woorden per persoon aan de woordweb toe te voegen.

Hieronder vind je een voorbeeld van een woordweb:

Step 5

Maak een factfile op basis van de vocab en grammar uit het boek. In de factfile zet je in korte Engelse zinnetjes informatie over de gekozen stad. Bijvoorbeeld: On monday it will be 20 degrees with sunshine, it is very easy to travel around by taxi or the museum we want to visit closes at 8.

Geef tenminste 5 feitjes over de stad. Gebruik hierbij waar nodig de vocab van het tekstboek hoofdstuk 8 op Blz. 127 en 128 en de grammar van stone 21 en 22 op pagina 121 en 124 van het tekstboek.

Deze gemaakte zinnen kunnen jullie vervolgens ook gebruiken om jullie project uit te leggen op de Travelmarkt.

Step 6

Kies minimaal 1 activiteit dat in het artikel wordt beschreven voor jullie eigen citytrip. Jullie hoeven niet persé al de activiteiten uit de artikelen te halen, jullie mogen natuurlijk ook zelf ideeën inbrengen en dit wordt ook hoger becijferd.

Haal bruikbare informatie uit het filmpje voor de eindopdracht. Je kunt uit het filmpje verschillende bezienswaardigheden halen die jullie bijvoorbeeld willen zien tijdens jullie trip.

Step 7

Schrijf het project plan waarin jullie vertellen welke keuzes jullie hebben gemaakt en waarom en ga daarna bezig met het maken van de opdracht:

Wat willen jullie graag zien tijdens jullie citytrip? Kies uit het maken van een folder, presentatie, collage of video waarin deze dingen voorkomen:

  • Twee musea die jullie willen zien.
  • Zoek op wat de bewoners eten en waar jullie graag willen eten elke avond.
  • Twee bezienswaardigheden die jullie willen zien. (gebouwen, standbeelden of voetbalstadions)
  • Hoe jullie gaan rondreizen in de stad. (bijvoorbeeld: met de auto of tram of bus)
  • En wat het weer zal zijn tijdens jullie bezoek.

BELANGRIJK!

Wat allemaal ingeleverd moet worden voor les 2 is:

  • Het projectplan
  • De factfile

De folder/presentatie,collage of video presenteren jullie tijdens de Travel Market in les 3.

Step 8

Nu presenteren jullie het eindproduct op de Travelmarkt. Jullie kunnen tijdens de markt de groepjes in tweeën delen zodat je over de markt kan lopen en ook de andere producten kan zien. Halverwege de les zullen de groepjes omgedraaid worden zodat iedereen de kans heeft gehad om rond te kijken en het eigen project uit te leggen.

Wees je ervan bewust dat je tijdens de markt vragen moet kunnen beantwoorden over jullie product dus zorg ervoor dat je de beslissingen die gemaakt zijn kunt uitleggen.

Tijdens de markt zal alles in het Engels besproken worden.

Step 9

Vul de onderstaande evaluatie in over het groepsproject

introduction.body: Werk samen met je groep en praat over hoe jullie het hebben gedaan tijdens het project. Geef met zijn allen aan of elke bewering juist of onjuist is.

prompt.body: Ik heb een interessante toeristenbrochure / poster / video gemaakt
Ik heb woorden van de vocablijst gebruikt tijdens dit project
Ik heb zinnen van de Stones gebruikt
Ik gaf duidelijke informatie over het weer en de vervoersmiddelen
Ik heb tijdens de markt vragen in het Engels beantwoord
Ik gaf informatie over de activiteiten die we tijdens onze citytrip wouden doen/zien

items.content:
The steps

Step 1

Start with choosing one of the following cities:

  • New York in America
  • London in England
  • Glasgow in Scotland
  • Dublin in Ireland
  • Toronto in Canada

Step 2

Read the article below of the city you chose. This will give you a bit of an idea on ​​what kind of activities you can do in the chosen city. You can use this information to make choices about which tourists attractions you want to visit during the city trip, which museums you want to see, what you want to eat, how you are going to travel around the city and what the weather will be like when you are in the city.

New York: https://www.telegraph.co.uk/travel/destinations/north-america/united-states/new-york/articles/new-york-attractions/

London: https://www.travelandleisure.com/slideshows/london

Glasgow: https://www.lonelyplanet.com/scotland/glasgow/travel-tips-and-articles/glasgow-for-every-travel-style/40625c8c-8a11-5710-a052-1479d27677d9

Dublin: https://www.visitdublin.com/see-do/visitor-attractions/visitor-attractions-2

Toronto: https://www.tripsavvy.com/toronto-attractions-and-highlights-1481772

Step 3

Listen to the video of your chosen city and get useful information for the assignment.

Some information about the cities:

New York: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUuHyXguUsg

London: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45ETZ1xvHS0

Glasgow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7ZqiSKIB9g

Dublin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LcKnx7I97yk

Toronto: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7uY0Ab5HlZ0

Step 4

Create a word web with words that relate to the city you have chosen. Put the name of the city in the middle of the paper and try to add 4 words per person to the word web.

Step 5

Create a fact file based on the vocab and grammar from the book. In the factfile you will put information about the chosen city in short English sentences. For example: On monday it will be 20 degrees with sunshine, it is very easy to travel around by taxi or the museum we want to visit closes at 8. You will at least add 8 facts about the city

You can use this factfile to explain your final project during the Travel market.

Use the vocab of the textbook chapter 8 on pages 127 and 128 and the grammar from stone 21 on page 121 and 124 of the textbook wherever necessary.

Step 6

Choose at least 1 activity that is described in the article for your own city trip. You do not necessarily have to choose the other remaining activity from the article as well, you can of course also contribute ideas yourself and this will also give you a higher grade!

Get useful information from the video for the final assignment. You can take various sightseeings from the video that you want to see during your trip.

Step 7

Write the project plan in which you tell us what choices you have made and why and after that start with making the final product:

What do you want to see during your city trip? Choose from creating a flyer, presentation, collage or video that contains these things:

  • Two museums that you want to see.
  • Find out what the residents eat and where you would like to eat every night.
  • Two sights that you want to see. (buildings, statues or football stadiums)
  • How you are going to travel around the city. (for example: by car or tram or bus)
  • And what the weather will be during your visit.

IMPORTANT!:

What must be handed in before the second lesson:

  • The project plan
  • The fact file

You will present your flyer / presentation, collage or video during the Travel Market in lesson 3.

Step 8

Now you will present the final product on the Travel Market. You can split the groups in two during the market so that you can walk across the market and see the other products as well. Halfway through the lesson, the groups will be switched around, so that everyone has the chance to look around and explain their own project.

Be aware that you have to be able to answer questions about your product during the Travel Market so make sure you can explain the decisions that have been made.

Everything will be discussed in English during the market.

Step 9

Complete the evaluation below about the group project.

introduction.body:
Work together with your group and talk about how everything went during the whole project.

Decide together with your group whether each statement is true or false.

prompt.body: We used words from the vocabulary in our final product
Everyone participated with the discussions in the group
We made an interesting tourist presentation, folder, collage or video
We answered questions in English during the market
We gave clear information about the weather and how we were going to travel around in the city
We gave information about the activities we wanted to do / see during our city trip

items.content:
The steps

Step 1

Start with choosing one of the following cities:

  • New York in America
  • London in England
  • Glasgow in Scotland
  • Dublin in Ireland
  • Toronto in Canada

Step 2

Read the article below of the city you chose. This will give you a bit of an idea on ​​what kind of activities you can do in the chosen city.


New York: https://www.travelandleisure.com/travel-guide/new-york-city/things-to-do

London: https://www.travelandleisure.com/articles/london-most-overrated-things-to-do

Glasgow: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2017/08/31/travel/what-to-do-36-hours-in-glasgow-scotland.html

Dublin: https://www.nomadicmatt.com/travel-guides/ireland/dublin/

Toronto: https://travel.usnews.com/Toronto/Things_To_Do/

Step 3

Listen to the video of your chosen city and get useful insight for the final product.

New York: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUuHyXguUsg

London: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45ETZ1xvHS0

Glasgow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7ZqiSKIB9g

Dublin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LcKnx7I97yk

Toronto: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7uY0Ab5HlZ0

Step 4

Create a fact file based on the vocab and grammar from the book that we discussed in the lessons. In the factfile you will put information about the chosen city in English sentences. You will add at least 10 facts about the city.

You can use this factfile to explain your final project during the Travel market.

Step 5

Choose 1 activity that is described in the article for your own city trip.

For the other remaining activity however, you cannot use the rest of the activities mentioned in the article. You will need to look one up yourselves on the internet.

Listen to the video again and write down 3 activities that are mentioned that you can do in your chosen city:

1. _________________________________________________________

2. _________________________________________________________

3. _________________________________________________________

Step 6

Write the project plan in which you tell us what choices you have made and why and after that start with making the final product:

What do you want to see during your city trip? Choose from creating a flyer, presentation, collage or video that contains these things:

  • Two museums that you want to see.
  • Find out what the residents eat and where you would like to eat every night.
  • Two sights that you want to see. (buildings, statues or football stadiums)
  • How you are going to travel around the city. (for example: by car or tram or bus)
  • And what the weather will be during your visit.

IMPORTANT!:

What must be handed in before the second lesson:

  • The project plan
  • The fact file

You will present your flyer / presentation, collage or video during the Travel Market in lesson 3.

Step 7

Now you present the final product on the Travel Market. You can share the groups in two during the market so that you can walk across the market and see the other products as well. Halfway through the lesson, the groups will be turned around so everyone has the chance to look around and explain their own project.

Be aware that you have to be able to answer questions about your project during the market so make sure you can explain the decisions that have been made and you need to convince the teacher and students why they should go on this trip as well.

Everything will be discussed in English during the market.

Step 8

Complete the evaluation below about the group project

introduction.body:
Work together with your group and talk about how everything went during the whole project.

Decide together with your group whether each statement is true or false.

prompt.body: We made an interesting tourist presentation, folder, collage or video
We used words from the vocabulary in our final project
Everyone participated with the discussions within the group
We gave clear information about the weather and with what kind of transport we were going to travel around with in the city
We answered questions in English during the market and convinced other people why they should go on this trip as well
We gave insight on the activities we wanted to do / see during our city trip

items.content: In dit tablad vind u de lesformulieren, het onderwijsleergesprek en de theoretische verantwoording. Dit tablad wordt afgeschermd voor de leerlingen zodat zij niet naar de knelpunten en verdere informatie kunnen kijken, maar de docent er wel direct bij kan.
